name: Donkey Defender
description:
Donkey Defender is a 3D action shooter with infinite waves of enemies, all seeking to steal your sweat little as- *ahem, donkey. 

You're left stranded on a remote dirt road with a busted wheel and basic gear. It seems like a pleasant place to break down. That is, until darkness surrounds you. At night, prepare yourself for an increasingly difficult fight! Thieves swarm your donkey in an attempt to capture it. Don't let them succeed! Kill growing numbers of enemies and collect their loot to grow stronger. 

Your ultimate goal is to fix your cart’s wheel, but it’ll take piles of money. You’re in luck though, these enemies are loaded with cash and items to sell that drop when they die. If you can somehow manage to repair your cart, the future is yours. You can test your endurance skills by fighting increasingly difficult waves of enemies for as long as you want, or escape on your fixed cart to win the game!
